tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crm_erp_integration (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  order_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  order_date DATE,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE ERP (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    customer_id INT
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CRM(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BusinessInsights (
    insight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    insight_description TEXT,
    customer_id INT,
    order_id INT,
    system_id INT
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CRM(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES ERP(order_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES OtherSystems(system_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crm_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE erp_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE other_system_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  date_added DATE
)
